title: [限時優惠] Jaybird x3 Bluetooth Earphone

replies.msg:
而家amazon.com 賣緊 $99.99，要買就快
https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Bluetooth-Headset-iPhone-Android/dp/B01M7NCT5O/ref=sr_1_1?s=wireless&ie=UTF8&qid=1494388369&sr=1-1&keywords=jaybird+x3
等左成個月，忍唔住原價買左，一買就減價
第一次玩amazon 洗唔洗運費

第一次玩amazon 洗唔洗運費

+usd6.39

睇過姐係total港紙860
佢計1usd = 8.08hkd

多謝巴打提醒
即刻入多隻俾女朋友
加保養就可以香港維修？

加保養就可以香港維修？

保養果個係點用

加保養就可以香港維修？

保養果個係點用

sor 原來好似得美國先有得加

Beats x好用定X3

一定係x3
咁買有冇保養 普通一年保養果種

https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/716OcjA1dpS.pdf
佢嘅講法應該係有
"Subject to the terms, conditions, and disclaimers contained herein, Jaybird LLC, a Utah limited liability company (“Jaybird” or “We”) warrants that Jaybird branded products (1) will be free of defects in materials and workmanship for 1 year from the date of purchase, as shown on the receipt, if the product was purchased from a retailer, or 1 year from the date of shipment, as shown on the packing slip, if the product was purchased from www.Jaybirdsport.com (the “Jaybird Website”); and (2) will not fail because of perspiration for the expected life of the product, as such expected life is determined by Jaybird in its sole discretion (the “Limited Warranty”). As used above, the phrase “fail because of perspiration” means that the electronicsin the product cease to function as a direct result of the effects of perspiration and excludes other
causes of failure, including without limitation broken wires, cracked casings, and dead batteries, even if they may have some indirect relation to perspiration.

但係都有review 話 customer service 好差
"Awful customer service
ByEricon April 27, 2017
Color: Blackout|Verified Purchase
after about one month the left ear bud had noise distortion (static) then completely stopped functioning. When I contacted customer service and explained the issue they suggested I reset the device 3x which I did but it didn't fix the problem. I requested a new set under the warranty claim. After about 6 weeks Jaybird still has not resolved the issue and has not honored their warranty. My experience with the customer service rep was poor and his supervisor did nothing to help either. They delay and create barriers to honoring their warranty. I do not recommend this product."

不過我隻freedom 用佐成年都無問題
